# foregroundAccessoryView

**Instance Property**

A view that appears in front of the title view in the launch scene.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var foregroundAccessoryView: UIView? { get set }
```

## Adding accessory views

- **backgroundAccessoryView**: A view that appears behind the title view in the launch scene.
